org.openexchangerates.client
Class OERClient

java.lang.Object
  org.openexchangerates.client.OERClient

public final class OERClient
extends java.lang.Object

openexchangerates.org (OER) client for Java. Deserializes OER JSON messages into native Java types. Depends on org.touge RestClient (a wrapper for HTTPUrlConnection) and org.json JSON library.

Author:
kgilmer

Constructor Detail

OERClient

public OERClient()
OERClient constructor with default HTTP client and no caching or debugging. Throw any errors back to the caller.

OERClient

public OERClient(RestClient.HttpGETCache cache)
OERClient constructor with defaults for everything except for cache.

Parameters:
cache -

OERClient

public OERClient(RestClient.HttpGETCache cache,
                 java.lang.String oerUrl,
                 int connectTimeout,
                 int readTimeout,
                 java.io.PrintWriter debugWriter,
                 RestClient.ErrorHandler errorHandler)
OERClient constructor with all configuration capabilities exposed to the client.

Parameters:
cache - cache impl or null for no caching
oerUrl - base URL to use to connect to OER service
connectTimeout - connection timeout
readTimeout - stream read timeout
debugWriter - PrintWriter to send request/response messages to. If null no debug output will be generated.
errorHandler - Determine how connection and deserialization errors are handled.
Method Detail

getLatestRates

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getLatestRates()
                                                                throws JSONException,
                                                                       java.io.IOException
Get the latest currency rates.

Returns:
Map of latest currency rates. Key is currency, value is rate as double.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - on I/O error
JSONException - on JSON parsing error

getRates

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getRates(java.util.Date date)
                                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                 JSONException
Get currency rates for a specified date. Only M/D/Y is handled.

Parameters:
date - Date to query rates for.
Returns:
Map of rates for given date, or throws IOException on 404.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - on I/O error
JSONException - on JSON parsing error

getCurrencies

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getCurrencies()
                                                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                      JSONException
Get the latest currencies from openexchangerates.org.

Returns:
Map of defined currencies with key as name and value as description.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - on I/O error
JSONException - on JSON parsing error

Throws:
